meanings.definition: A highly seasoned stew of meat and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious ragout for dinner.
meanings.sent2: My mom's ragout is always a hit at family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The ragout smelled so good that even the picky eater couldn't resist.
meanings.sent4: The flavors in the ragout danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The colorful ragout looked like a work of art on the plate.

meanings.definition: To cook slowly and gently in a seasoned broth.
meanings.sent1: I like to ragout the vegetables to bring out their flavors.
meanings.sent2: She ragouts the meat until it is tender and juicy.
meanings.sent3: He decided to ragout the ingredients while singing his favorite song.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the ragouting stew filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: Ragouting the dish requires patience and attention to detail.
